00008 /**
00009  * extends the normal cacheutility with more memcached functions
00010  * @package kata_utility
00011  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00012  */
00013 class ExtcacheUtility extends CacheUtility {
00014 
00015     /**
00016      * increment given key. if nonexistant (or not numeric) key will be assumed as 0
00017      * @param string $id key name
00018      * @param string|bool $forceMethod which method to use instead of the autodetected one
00019      * @return bool success
00020      */
00021     public function increment($id, $forceMethod=false) {
00022         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00023             $this->results[] = array(
00024                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00025                 'inc',
00026                 $id,
00027                 '*caching off*',
00028                 0
00029             );
00030             return false;
00031         }
00032 
00033         $startTime = microtime(true);
00034         $this->initialize();
00035         $r = $this->_increment($id, $forceMethod);
00036 
00037         if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00038             $this->requestCache[$id] = $r;
00039         }
00040 
00041         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00042             $this->results[] = array(
00043                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00044                 'inc',
00045                 $id,
00046                 kataFunc::getValueInfo($r),
00047                 microtime(true) - $startTime
00048             );
00049         }
00050         return $r;
00051     }
00052 
00053     /**
00054      * do the actual incrementing
00055      * @param string $id
00056      * @param string|bool $forceMethod
00057      * @return bool success
00058      */
00059     protected function _increment($id, $forceMethod) {
00060         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00061 
00062         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00063             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00064         } else {
00065             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00069             $this->initMemcached(true);
00070             return $this->memcachedClass->increment($id);
00071         }
00072 
00073         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00074             $this->initMemcached();
00075             return $this->memcachedClass->increment($id);
00076         }
00077 
00078         throw new Exception('ExtCacheUtil: increment works only with memcache(d)');
00079     }
00080 
00081     /**
00082      * decrement given key. if nonexistant (or not numeric) key will be assumed as 0
00083      * @param string $id key name
00084      * @param string|bool $forceMethod which method to use instead of the autodetected one
00085      * @return bool success
00086      */
00087     public function decrement($id, $forceMethod=false) {
00088         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00089             $this->results[] = array(
00090                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00091                 'dec',
00092                 $id,
00093                 '*caching off*',
00094                 0
00095             );
00096             return false;
00097         }
00098 
00099         $startTime = microtime(true);
00100         $this->initialize();
00101         $r = $this->_decrement($id, $forceMethod);
00102 
00103         if ($r && $this->useRequestCache) {
00104             $this->requestCache[$id] = $r;
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00108             $this->results[] = array(
00109                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00110                 'inc',
00111                 $id,
00112                 kataFunc::getValueInfo($r),
00113                 microtime(true) - $startTime
00114             );
00115         }
00116         return $r;
00117     }

00120      * do the actual decrementing
00121      * @param string $id
00122      * @param string|bool $forceMethod
00123      * @return bool success
00124      */
00125     public function _decrement($id, $forceMethod=false) {
00126         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00127 
00128         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00129             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00130         } else {
00131             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00132         }
00133 
00134         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00135             $this->initMemcached(true);
00136             return $this->memcachedClass->decrement($id);
00137         }
00138 
00139         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHE == $this->method) {
00140             $this->initMemcached();
00141             return $this->memcachedClass->decrement($id);
00142         }
00143 
00144         throw new Exception('ExtCacheUtil: decrement works only with memcache(d)');

00147     /**
00148      * read key and set comapareAndSet variable
00149      * @param string $id keyname
00150      * @param float $casVariable variable to put the cas-value into
00151      * @param string|bool $forceMethod which method to use
00152      * @return string
00153      */
00154     public function readCas($id, &$casVariable, $forceMethod = false) {
00155         $r = $this->read($id, $forceMethod);
00156         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00157             $casVariable = $this->casToken;
00158         } else {
00159             throw new Exception('ExtCacheUtil: readCas works only with memcached');
00160         }
00161         return $r;
00162     }
00163 
00164     /**
00165      * read multiple keys at once
00166      * @param array $ids keynames
00167      * @param string|bool $forceMethod which method to use
00168      * @return array
00169      */
00170     public function getMulti($ids, $forceMethod=false) {
00171         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00172             foreach ($ids as $id) {
00173                 $this->results[] = array(
00174                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00175                     'read',
00176                     $ids,
00177                     '*caching off*',
00178                     0
00179                 );
00180             }
00181             return false;
00182         }
00183 
00184         $startTime = microtime(true);
00185         $this->initialize();
00186 
00187         foreach ($ids as &$id) {
00188             $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00189         }
00190         unset($id);
00191 
00192         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00193             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00194         } else {
00195             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00196         }
00197 
00198         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00199             $this->initMemcached(true);
00200 
00201             $r = $this->memcachedClass->getMulti($ids);
00202             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00203                 $endTime = microtime(true) - $startTime;
00204                 foreach ($ids as $no => $id) {
00205                     $this->results[] = array(
00206                         kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00207                         'read',
00208                         $id,
00209                         kataFunc::getValueInfo($r[$no]),
00210                         $endTime
00211                     );
00212                 }
00213             }
00214 
00215             if ($this->useRequestCache) {
00216                 foreach ($ids as $id) {
00217                     $this->requestCache[$id] = $r[$id];
00218                 }
00219             }
00220 
00221             return $r;
00222         }
00223 
00224         throw new Exception('ExtCacheUtil: getMulti works only with memcache(d)');
00225     }
00226 
00227     /**
00228      * set key only if the stored casToken equals our castoken (=key is unchanged)
00229      * @param float $casToken castoken previously obtained by readCas
00230      * @param string $id keyname
00231      * @param string $value keyvalue
00232      * @param integer $ttl time to live in seconds
00233      * @param string|bool $forceMethod method to use
00234      * @return boolean
00235      */
00236     public function compareAndSwap($casToken, $id, $value, $ttl=0, $forceMethod=false) {
00237         if (DEBUG > 2) {
00238             $this->results[] = array(
00239                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00240                 'read',
00241                 $id,
00242                 '*caching off*',
00243                 0
00244             );
00245             return false;
00246         }
00247 
00248         $startTime = microtime(true);
00249         $this->initialize();
00250 
00251         $id = CACHE_IDENTIFIER . '-' . $id;
00252 
00253         if (false === $forceMethod) {
00254             $this->method = $this->defaultMethod;
00255         } else {
00256             $this->method = $forceMethod;
00257         }
00258 
00259         if (self :: CM_MEMCACHED == $this->method) {
00260             $this->initMemcached(true);
00261             $r = $this->memcachedClass->cas($casToken, $id, $value, $ttl);
00262 
00263             $done = true;
00264             if (($r) && ($this->memcachedClass->getResultCode() == Memcached::RES_SUCCESS)) {
00265                 $done = true;
00266             }
00267             $done = false;
00268 
00269             if (DEBUG > 0) {
00270                 $this->results[] = array(
00271                     kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00272                     'read',
00273                     $id,
00274                     $done ? 'swapped' : 'my data is stale',
00275                     microtime(true) - $startTime
00276                 );
00277             }
00278 
00279             return $done;
00280         }
00281 
00282         throw new Exception('ExtCacheUtil: compareAndSwap works only with memcache(d)');
00283     }
